data.name: Edrick's Conquest™
data.detailed_description:
PLEASE FOLLOW THE KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN

Follow the Kickstarter here:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/powergames/edricks-conquesttm


About the Game



Edrick's Conquest™ is an isometric open world Action RPG featuring unique gameplay, charming environments & competitive play. Explore Plesmur, a high fantasy world, to discover ancient dungeons and civilizations.

Face fantasy creatures such as the stoic orcs, ancient elementals and immortal revenants in the world of Plesmur... Or dominate your allies in multiplayer deathmatch arenas.

KEY FEATURES (SUBJECT TO THE SUCCESS OF KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN)


Deep character development:
3 foundation character classes that can progress into 9 ultimate classes.

Story-driven Campaign mode:
Play as King Edrick Stormwalker--an elite and experienced Flame Crusader. Choose to be a champion or a villain depending on your actions!

Offline and Online Play:
Explore Plesmur, a high fantasy world, on your own or with your allies. Play with up to 7 friends on Local Area Network or Online connection.

Difficulty modes:
You can choose from 3 distinct difficulty settings: Novice, Normal and Nightmare. The novice difficulty is designed for newcomers and casuals while nightmare difficulty is for hardcore players.

Hack and slash:
Crush your enemies with powerful spells like 'Fan of Fire'; 'Skeleton Explosion' and 'Starfall'.



Character customization:
Learn passive and active skills through the 'Special Powers' menu.

Cursor aiming system:
A unique action combat system which prioritizes the player's agility over stats, gear and skill points.

Multiplayer PvP:
Dominate your allies in competitive PvP deathmatch arenas. To make sure PvP is fair, all spells will have a special PvP version. For balancing purposes some spells will be disabled in PvP. 3 exclusive arena character classes will be designed to ensure competitive and balanced PvP.

Cross-platform support:
You will be able to play Edrick's Conquest on PC, Linux, Playstation and Xbox.

PvE Quest mode:
An endgame mode where you raid rogue-like procedurally generated dungeons, with up to 7 allies or solo.



Dungeon and Scenario Designer:
Create your own dungeon, zone or quest then invite other members of the community to experience your content.

Limitless Endgame Content:
Thanks to the Dungeon and Scenario Designer, a powerful in-game level editor, members of the community will create high quality endgame content. Lots of endgame content such as dungeons, skill trees, items and even new playable character classes will be frequently produced by dedicated community members.

Apocalyptic Forms:
Transform into a highly customized character of your choice. You will be able to select mutations and evolve your character as you wish.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 660ti or AMD R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 660ti or AMD R9 270
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
